author: @onlyfoolsfall9249
text: What I love about this aside from them staying true to their original sound is how meaningful the whole concept and song are. It’s something most fans can genuinely relate to. These days, a lot of songs focus more on sounding cool and end up compromising on the depth of the lyrics. I really hope more songs like this come out not necessarily the same style, but ones that are both meaningful and enjoyable at the same time.

text:
SEVENTEEN - _WORLD (Romanized) Lyrics

[Verse 1: S.COUPS, Mingyu]
Hey, akkabuteo neol bwasseo
Urin cheoeumijiman modeun jaemireul neukkil su isseo deo algo sipeo
Hey, utjiman malgo mariya (Yuh)
Gabon jeogi eomneun gose neoreul deryeoga julge

[Pre-Chorus: Wonwoo, Hoshi]
Come with me
Put it on, put it on me
You got this
Put it on, put it on me
Gyeolguk nae soneul jabeul geoya
'Cause I know that you've been dreaming



[Chorus: DK, SeungKwan, Vernon]
Machi cheongugui déjà vu
Jigeumbuteo nan neol manna interview
Nega wonhan modeun geol da jul suga isseo
Neoui eoduun moseupkkajido
Come, come into my world

[Post-Chorus: Dino, THE 8]
Won't let you down
Won't let you down
Naegero wa
In my, in my, in my new world

[Verse 2: Vernon, S.COUPS]
Knock, knock, knockin' on heaven's door
Whipped cream gureum sonkkeuteuro sseureo
Nae all star mite ditgo nara sunset
Neom ppareum? I'ma take it slow
Seulpeumi eomneun goseseo idaero chumeul chwo
Bakjae matchwo baksu
Neon yeongwoneul naege jwo gippeumui maseul deo
Yeongwone yeongwoneul deo, deo, deo, deo

[Pre-Chorus: THE 8, Jeonghan]
Come with me
Put it on, put it on me
You got this
Put it on, put it on me
Gyeolguk nae soneul jabeul geoya
'Cause I know that you've been dreaming

[Chorus: WOOZI, Joshua, Jeonghan]
Machi cheongugui déjà vu
Jigeumbuteo nan neol manna interview
Nega wonhan modeun geol da jul suga isseo
Neoui eoduun moseupkkajido
Come, come into my world

[Post-Chorus: Jun, Dino]
Won't let you down
Won't let you down
Naegero wa
In my, in my, in my new world

[Bridge: Mingyu, SeungKwan, Joshua]
We got the heart, we got the soul
Idaero uri mameul yeoreo
Neoege neon naege
Saeroun miraereul yeoreojwo na soneul nochi aneulge
Trust in me, baby, I can see

[Chorus: Hoshi, DK, Wonwoo]
Machi cheongugui déjà vu
Jigeumbuteo nan neol manna interview
Nega wonhan modeun geol da jul suga isseo
Neoui eoduun moseupkkajido
Come, come into my world

[Post-Chorus: WOOZI, Jun]
Won't let you down
Won't let you down
Naegero wa
In my, in my, in my new world

text:
Everytime when i see they are not getting the fruit for what they are working for, they are literally SELF producing man!,
they are giving their whole everytime, but why wouldn't they get their value? i'm soo worried  bout that.  at first when i started to stan svt,
i really wondered how could a fandom be like this, i heard back then carats over the 'WORLD' put on their own money to promote their albums.  
literally members owe this fandom,  there's a saying in my language that  "மன்னன் எவ்வழி மக்கள் அவ்வழி" it means,
 LIKE IDOL, LIKE FANDOM' and they're proving it. ohh god, why would i found them soo late
i really wish seventeen to reach great heights in future❣.. i promise, i would always be there to support the team no matter what....

author: @noreenjtn
text:
when exo was not actively promoting bc of military enlistment I thought that I would also be on hiatus with my fangirling for awhile. But when I discovered svt it felt like I found a precious gem. No wonder why the fans our called carats. cuz these guys are truly a GEM 💎 I am just as happy. I knew in my heart that I would love and respect them as much as exo. ♥️♥️♥️ to svt you have filled my heart especially on the times when I missed exo a lot. 
As I would always say a humble and talented group have the luckiest fans their could ever be. Thank you for spoiling us with good music. ✨ 

and yes I have a good taste 🤣

author: @maria-by5wl
text:
Became a fan literally just last month! I thought I wouldn't find/stan another band other than BTS but here I am! One compelling thing about Seventeen is that they are so diverse. There's such a wide variety of personalities, voices, talents and such. It's so beautiful. Also, they may be a lot but the way they distribution lines is so nice T—T All of their songs are soooo amazing, too. I wish I'd know them sooner but better than never.

Hi to armycarts if there is!! And you may guess my bias on SVT! 😅

author: @rendeypalubos
text:
THIS IS JUST TOO BEAUTIFUL BEYOND WORDS! The most amazing thing about this group is having 13 totally multi-talented members with diverse personalities and they make such a rare and powerful combination resulting to all these top-tier performances and songs that reach a whole new level of musicality.

With 13 members giving a rich and flavorful variation in the voices, every performance is a sure knockout - not to mention, the level of sophistication and choreography that leaves you breathless. Every song and number is a monument of their dedication and hard work for thir fans, us CARATS.

Stanning SEVENTEEN is the best thing that happened in my life!

I thought Wonwoo will be the last but then I see Jun. Ghad, Jun's face, make-up and styling is so on point here. He's so soft. I love them all though.

author: @ayeongshin802
text: For me, I like Svt's music because of how real and true it is. It might not be groundbreaking but they have a way of breathing life and emotion into a song that not many groups can replicate.  It is generally simple and sweet and it warms the heart. Especially with their bsides. Most of SVT's songs to me are like going home after a long day or a warm blanket on a cold day. They make you feel good and heard. And that's the kind of music I love.

author: @neditioms4902
text:
La verdad es que Seventeen tiene tremendos vocalistas. Dk y Seungkwan son una cosa tremenda, no es por desmerecer PERO AFANAN LEJOS, otro es Hoshi, amo el color de su voz, incluso el líder cuando canta es un vozarron lindo, woozi es suavecito, pero tiene lo suyo como Joshua y Jeonghan. Minghao, Dino y Jun tienen una voz preciosa y dulce.  Y cuando Vernon y MinGyu son vocales y no raperos es tremendo también.
Ay casi se le olvida Jeon, pero tremendo también entra junto con MinGyu y Vernon, es una voz profunda la que tienen los tres

 Mingyu’s unbuttoned shirt with a sexy whispering voice

The sea gave up the dead who were in it, and Death and Hades delivered up the dead who were in them. And they were judged, each one according to his works. 
Then Death and Hades were cast into the lake of fire. This is the second death. And anyone NOT FOUND written in the Book of Life was cast into the lake of fire." (REVELATION 20:12-15 NKJV)


Today, while you are still alive and able, may you repent from your sins, believe in your heart and confess with your mouth that JESUS CHRIST is your Lord and Savior, so that through Him, your name will be written in the Book of Life. 


"For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever BELIEVES in Him 
should not perish but have everlasting life. 
For God did not send His Son into the world to condemn the world, but that the world through Him might be saved." (JOHN 3:16-17 NKJV)

author: @parthamukherjee2285
text:
SEVENTEEN's strength in dancing is well known to the world but let's talk about their vocals. Their 2 main vocals DK and Seungkwan are absolutely amazing. They can sing high notes with their chest voices. Their pronounciation is clear and they put soul into the lyrics. Seungkwan also has good lower register tone as well (example Seungkwan's line in Ash). In SEVENTEEN debut project Bumzu, their vocal coach had praised DK for his outstanding vocals. Joshua and Jeonghan on the other hand has two very unique tones. Joshua is good at falsetto at the same time his lower register sounds very husky (ex. Rock With You begining lines). Jeonghan's voice fits the more layed back tone but he also knows how to put emotions in song. Woozi hands down knows how emotions work in a song. He makes and gives the BEST adlibs iMO. He really knows how to sing to deliver the song well. 
Now let's come to the performance unit. Jun can honestly be mistaken as a lead vocalist if someone only heard his solo. His voice is very unique and has this not overpowering breathiness. Minghao is really good with soft songs but he can push back his voice to make it sound more raspy (Call! Call! Call!). Hoshi is the only perf Unit member to be a lead vocalist. His voice is extremely stable and he sings with his real voice. He is good at falsetto at the same time growling. Dino has a very unique way of singing. It's not exactly nasal but he uses his tongue differently while singing so it adds a touch to the song. 
Even though they are rappers hip hop unit is actually really good singers, ironically for ballad songs. Their voices are deep but at the same time it's filled with emotions. Vernon has really good breath control on his voice. Cheol's voice is really soft and he mostly used his chest voice. Wonwoo changes hus tones based on the meaning of the lyrics. Mingyu is especially good with vocals. His voice is nasally but he uses it for his advantage. Songs like Lean on me, I can't run away really shows Hip hop units vocals. 
All in all SEVENTEEN are OUTSTANDING vocalists with stable vocals and unique tones and they need to be praised more.

author: @suisuishaa
text:
All new carats coming, its making old carat me feel super duper happy🥹 Boys, you reached higher, like you always do. Can't believe its been 7+ years watching you guys grow from dorks training in the melona prison and saw you sob back in 2016 for your first win, watched you won best performance in mama 2017 and watched woozi win best producer recently. I was always sad because i truly felt you guys deserves even more. I can't never be not proud of being there throughout your story. I'll look forward to your next solo hoshi, you've been teasing us a lot with spoilers😂 Hoping its a wine party concept.

+I have been relistening to the love and letter repack and have been sobbing about how far it has been. Boys to adults facing new heights. Cheers for more years together.

author: @cesargomez6504
text:
180 ° Turn! 

RISEN CHRIST SAID! 
AND HE said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:
[Luke 24:46]

AND THAT repentance and remission of sins should be preached in His name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem. 
[Luke 24:47; Acts 4:12]

AND HE said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature. 
[Mark 16:15-16]

FOR I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek. 
[Romans 1:16]

FOR THE preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God. 
[1 Cor. 1:18]

FOR I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received, how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures; 
[1 Cor. 15:3]

AND THAT He was buried, and that He rose again the third day according to the scriptures:
[1 Cor. 15:4]

PETER said:
WHO HIS own self bare our sins in His own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed. 
[1 Peter 2:24; Is. 53:4-5;
Mt. 8:16-17]

PAUL said:
IN WHOM we have redemption through His blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of His grace; 
[Eph. 1:7]

PETER said:
THE LORD is not slack concerning His promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance. 
[2 Peter 3:9-14]

REPENT YE therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord; 
[Acts 3:19]

JOHN said:
IF WE confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness. 
[1 John 1:9]

PAUL said:
THAT IF thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised Him from the dead, thou shalt be saved. 
[Romans 10:6-9-13]

CHRIST HIMSELF SAID! 
AND THIS gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come. 
[Matthew 24:14 KJV]

Come! Lord Jesus
Christ! Come!

" C h o o s e  L i f e "

서명호ㅜㅜ 만약에 명함 만들게 되면 핑크머리 찰떡남 꼭...써줘 핑크 머리 찰떡콩떡 말랑이~ 

(최) 승철아.. 오늘 착장 마치 애들의 성화에 갑작스레 올라간 상황에서 무대를 뒤집어 놓을 재질이구나  정말 예쁘다..🥺 

이디노ㅠㅜㅜㅜㅜㅜ 넌 진짜... 그런 제스처 누구한테 배웠어어....🥺 

문준휘...핑크도 찰떡이네.. 안어울리는.컬러가 대체 뭐니..!🥺 없다구? 알겠어!!! 

권순영 음색에 녹은 사람 손🙋 했더니 하나 둘씩 슬라임재질로 다들 변하더라.. 권순영🥺🥺 겁나 이뻐 진짜.. 어쩜 그렇게 다 예뻐🥺🤦🤦🤦🤦🤦❤️‍🔥 

부승관... 금발 진짜 너무 찰떡 콩떡 말랑이ㅜㅜ
아니 왤케 이쁜데... 모발아... 혹시 내 말이.들린다면 부승관 머리 자라날땐 꼭... 금발로 자라나게 해줘..🥺 

조슈아... 진짜 슈크림보다 단 남자..🥺
은혜롭다 정말... 어쩜 그래ㅜㅜ🥺
디즈니는 뭐해..실사화 밤비 제작하면 무조건 우리 슈아다..!!! 

윤정한... 바니하니 ㅜㅜ 어쩜 그렇게 이뻐.. 
다래끼 마저 악세사리로 착용하는 그대... 
누가 뭐래도 꽃보다 아름다워!!!!!!!!🥺 

김민규.... 너 정말... 단추 여며..아니 여미지마..
몰라 너하고 싶은데로 다해..🥺🤦 

전원우..진짜.. 원두 커피 같은 이 남자...🥺🤦


이지훈 넌 진짜.. 천재야!!!!!
외모 천재! 음색 천재! 작곡 천재!!!!!!!!!!!!!
( 귀여움 천재!!) 

최한솔.... 넌 진짜 걸어다니는 조각상이구나.. 

세상에... 박물관에 전화해야하나... 여기 걸어다니는 조각상이 노래도 하구..막 윙크도 하는데
...... 제 심장이 안 남아 돌겠어요... 혹시  전 얼마나 살 수 있을까요..(?) 

밴드 버전도 좋으면 어쩌죠... 어쩌긴 뭘 어째 사랑할수 밖에... 월드 투어 조심해서 잘하구오구... 이쁘고 좋은 추억들, 행복한 순간들이 많기를 소망해!!🥺<마지막으로 큰 절 한번 하고 전 이만🙇‍♀️

text:
진짜 너무 늦게 세븐틴을 좋아하게 돼서 엄청 후회되고 그랬지만 이제라도 알게 돼서 다행이라고 생각이 들어. 어떤 그룹이 나를 이렇게 행복하게 만들어줄 수 있을 거라고 상상도 못했어 진짜. 마침 또 살면서 힘이 안나고 열정이 없을 때 딱 세븐틴 음악을 듣고 영상을 보게 되었는데 힘든 시기에 정말 많은 힘이 되어줬어. 이게 바로 진정한 아티스트 아닌가 싶다. 활동하면서 힘들고 아파도 팬과 다른 사람들을 행복하게 만들어주는 그런 아티스트인 세븐틴! 너무 존경하고 사랑합니당
그리고  너무 고마워요💙 제가 당신들 덕분에 행복해진 것처럼 여러분들도 앞으로 항상 행복하기만 했으면 좋겠어요!🙏🏻
